p: First, clusters were identified using the Maximum Likelihood (ML) method with the NNI-SPR sub-tree algorithm under the GTR+Î³ with the PHYML v 3.0 using automatic model selection [ 28]. Clustering was assessed by Cluster Picker software with the maximum genetic distances calculated by the program [ 31]. Monophyletic clusters were identified with Cluster-picker software using 3% within-cluster distance (substitutions/site) threshold and 0.9 aLRT bootstrap values. Phylogeographic interregional links within the clustered sequences were investigated.
